text: Enteric can refer to: *A general term describing something related to or associated with the intestines **Microorganisms that inhabit the intestines are commonly known as enteric bacteria *Enteric nervous system *Enteric coating that is often applied to pills and supplements *"Enteric fever" is a name for typhoid fever *Enteric duplication cysts *Methane emitted from livestock is known as Enteric fermentation
title: Enteric (disambiguation)
